title: Studio
posting_body: ['Contact us for details on our specials!', 'The Dwight', '2121 Dwight Way, Berkeley, CA, 94704', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 139', 'OR Text', '139', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our leasing team.', 'Survival of the happiest', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 501 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Berkeley’s modern apartments designed to make you happy.', 'Mellow out on a rooftop terrace with gas grills, fire pits, dining area and heaters; or mingle in the resident lounge and activity room.', 'Pamper your furry friend at the pet run and washing station.', 'Inside your home, large windows, 9-foot ceilings, quartz countertops, tile backsplashes and hard-surface flooring lend sophistication to your space.', 'Proximity to UC, public transit and Berkeley’s unique shops and restaurants connects you to the larger community.', 'The Dwight.', 'Apartment living, evolved.', 'Features', '- Air Conditioning', "- 8' Solid Core Doors", '- Great Kitchens', '- Hard Surface Flooring', '- USB Outlets & Fiber Internet', '- Energy Star Appliances', '- LG Washers & Dryers', '- Large Windows', "- 9' Ceilings", 'Community Amenities', '- Outdoor Heaters', '- Bike Room & Workshop', '- Dog Area & Washing Station', '- Rooftop Terrace', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Saturday:9:00AM-6:00PM', '8YwT62NgE']
